itemLabel: Sir Hamilton Edward de Coucey Howard, 2nd Baronet
itemDescription: English aristocrat, Lord Mayor of London

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Hamilton Edward de Coucey Howard, 2nd Baronet  (19 October 1915 – 16 March 2001), known as Sir Edward Howard, was an English aristocrat, businessman and public official.

response: Sir Hamilton Edward de Coucey Howard, 2nd Baronet (1915-2001).

Howard was born on 29 December 1945.The Peerage: Sir David Howarth Seymour Howard, 3rd Bt. His father was Sir Hamilton Edward de Coucey Howard, 2nd Baronet (1915–2001) and his mother, Elizabeth Howarth Ludlow. His paternal grandfather was Sir Seymour Howard, 1st Baronet (1886-1967). He graduated from Radley College, a boarding school in Radley, Oxfordshire, and from  Worcester College, Oxford, where he received a Masters of Arts degree.
